note.p: Dressmaker. Daughter of John Richards, surveyor. Personal maid to Emma Darwin before she married CDâ€™s servant Joseph Parslow in 1845. Lived at 18 Home Cottage, Down, Kent. Ran a dressmaking school.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/462/71/4)
Certificate of Marriage, 20 May 1845, St George Hanover Square, London, General Register Office, England
